channel.title: My Portfolio on Joanna Sowa
channel.description: Recent content in My Portfolio on Joanna Sowa

item.title: Contact
item.description: Follow me on these social media platforms. Platform URL LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/asiasowa/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/asia_sowa Medium: https://medium.com/@asia_sowa

item.title: Project 1: My PhD thesis
item.description: During my PhD in neuropsychopharmacology, I: wrote grant proposal and was awarded with the grant Preludium11 funded by National Science Centre, Poland, making this project possible collected data by perfoming patch-clamp experiments, in which I recorded neuronal signals from single neurons in the amygdala circuit wrote MATLAB scripts to detect spikes from neuronal electrical signal and analyze their parameters (frequency, width, and amplitude) developed my own R package using devtools to wrange, analyze, and visualize my data (tidyverse, ggplot2)

item.title: Project 2: Data-Driven Spiking Neuronal Models
item.description: In this Jupyter Notebook I used Exponential-Integrate and Fire neuron model to measure such neuronal parameters as firing frequency and inter-spike intervals (ISI) Parameters were chosen based on my PhD data and/or scientific literature By using interactive widgets from ipywidgets library, the relationship between the amount of injected current and neuronal response can be easily visualized Models were written utilizing numpy and pandas and results were visualized with matplotlib and seaborn

item.title: Scientific activity
item.description: PhD candidate’s scientific activity Publications Kazmierska-Grebowska P., Siwiec M., Sowa JE, Caban B., Kowalczyk T., Bocian R., MacIver MB. Lamotrigine Attenuates Neuronal Excitability, Depresses GABA Synaptic Inhibition, and Modulates Theta Rhythms in Rat Hippocampus. International Journal of Molecular Sciences. 2021 Dec 05 Kusek M, Siwiec M, Sowa JE, Bobula B, Bilecki W, Ciurej I, Kaczmarczyk M, Kowalczyk T, Maćkowiak M, Hess G, Tokarski K. 5-HT7 receptors enhance inhibitory synaptic input to principal neurons in the mouse basal amygdala.
